GlobalModels Class Reference

This class allows any ChunkEmbodiments to be in the world, without being attached to an entity or another model. More...

#include <chunk_embodiment.hpp>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static void tick (float dTime)
static void fini ()

Detailed Description

This class allows any ChunkEmbodiments to be in the world, without being attached to an entity or another model.

Anything that can be converted to a ChunkEmbodiment is allowed here.
